name: Survival (itch) (frannkmh)
description:
Survival:

It is a 2d top down game endless game where the main goal is to survive and score as many points as u can with  the use of the mechanics provided in the game.
 The longer you survive the harder it gets, try to use the map as advantage for you ;).

Enjoy and get the higger score there is!!!!

We take recommendations and comments so feel free to let us know your opinion.

Frannkmh.
